item.name: agite-alpt-atf
item.description:
API Full mTLS and full passthrought, in SOAP/XML

- APIGEE -> SAFT need to be mTLS ,
    
- APIGEE need to get the certificate from SAFT to establish connection with AT
    
- NC to APIGEE np mTLS in phase-1
    
- APIGEE will generate the CSR and someone from Financial team needs to request the signing of certificates PROD/NOPROD
    

HTTP header Authorization used for NRM to APIGEE authentication. NRM JWT token for authentication to be sent as an authorization bearer token. APIGEE needs to validate this token with NRM JWKS url endpoint to authenticate the call.

SOAP header will be construted by NC and APIGEE will pass to AT as it is

header.description: YYYYMMDDhhmmss this is the date format por SAP/RMCA, only digits/numbers

item.name: API 237 - ACC - Retrieve Billing Account by ID
